TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ChartGroup

summary.span: 代表图表中用同一格式绘制的一个或多个系列。

span.span: Represents one or more series plotted in a chart with the same format.

summary.span: ChartGroup对象是集合的一 个成员。

span.span: The ChartGroup object is a member of the collection.

para.span: 一张图表包含一个或多个图表组，每个图表组包含一个或多个系列，每个数据系列包含一个或多个点。

span.span: A chart contains one or more chart groups, each chart group contains one or more series, and each series contains one or more points.

para.span: 例如，单张图表可能既包含折线图图表组，其中包含所有用折线图格式，绘制的数据系列也条形图图表组，其中包含所有用条形图格式绘制的数据系列。

span.span: For example, a single chart might contain both a line chart group, containing all the series plotted with the line chart format, and a bar chart group, containing all the series plotted with the bar chart format.

para.span: 使用 ChartGroups () 图表组索引号，返回 单个 ChartGroup 对象。

span.span: Use ChartGroups(), where is the chart-group index number, to return a single ChartGroup object.

para.span: 如果图表已激活，可以使用 该属性。

span.span: If the chart has been activated, you can use the property.

para.span: 因为当特定图表组所用的图表格式更改时，该图表组的索引号可能会更改，所以使用命名图表组快捷方法之一来返回特定的图表组会更加容易。

span.span: Because the index number for a particular chart group can change if the chart format used for that group is changed, it may be easier to use one of the named chart group shortcut methods to return a particular chart group.

para.span: 该方法返回图表中饼图图表组的集合，该方法返回线形图图表组的集合 ，等等。

span.span: The method returns the collection of pie chart groups in a chart, the method returns the collection of line chart groups, and so on.

para.span: 这些方法中的每一个都可以与索引号配合使用以返回单个 ChartGroup 对象，或不指定索引号而返回 ChartGroups 集合。

span.span: Each of these methods can be used with an index number to return a single ChartGroup object, or without an index number to return a ChartGroups collection.

para.span: 可以使用以下图表组方法：

span.span: The following chart group methods are available:
method
method
method
method
method
method

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象代表指定对象的创建者 (可以使用 OLE 自动化对象的此属性返回该对象 的应用程序) 。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlAxisGroup AxisGroup { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlAxisGroup get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlAxisGroup value); };

summary.span: 返回指定的图表组或数据系列所属的坐标轴组。

span.span: Returns the group for the specified chart group or series.

para.span: 对于三维图表，只有 xlPrimary 有效。

span.span: For 3-D charts only xlPrimary is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BubbleScale { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定图表组中气泡的比例因子。

span.span: Returns or sets the scale factor for bubbles in the specified chart group.

summary.span: 可以是从 0（零）到 300 的整数值，对应于默认大小的百分比。

span.span: Can be an integer value from 0 (zero) to 300, corresponding to a percentage of the default size.

summary.span: 仅适用于气泡图。

span.span: Applies only to bubble charts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CategoryCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function CategoryCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

span.span: The name or number of the categories.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象代表图表组中 (所有) 类别的集合。

span.span: Returns an object that represents a collection of all of the visible categories (a collection) in the chart group.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

summary.span: 如果该对象是在 Microsoft Excel 中创建的，则此属性返回字符串 XCEL，它等同于十六进制的数字 5843454C。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.

para.span: Creator 属性是为 Macintosh 上的 Microsoft Excel 设计的，在 Macintosh 上，每个应用程序都具有一个四字符的创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码为 XCEL。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DoughnutHoleSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置圆环图图表组的内径大小。

span.span: Returns or sets the size of the hole in a doughnut chart group.

summary.span: 内径大小以图表大小的百分比表示，有效取值范围为 10% 到 90%。

span.span: The hole size is expressed as a percentage of the chart size, between 10 and 90 percent.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DownBars As DownBars

summary.span: 返回 一个对象，该对象代表线形图上的跌柱线。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the down bars on a line chart.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DropLines As DropLines

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象代表线形图或面积图上系列的 下拉线。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the drop lines for a series on a line chart or area chart.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图或分区图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts or area charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int FirstSliceAngle { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置第一个饼图或圆环图扇区的角度（以度 (垂直方向) 。

span.span: Returns or sets the angle of the first pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice in degrees (clockwise from vertical).

summary.span: 只适用于饼图、三维饼图和圆环图。

span.span: Applies only to pie, 3-D pie, and doughnut charts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object FullCategoryCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function FullCategoryCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

span.span: The name or number of the categories.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象代表图表组中所有可见类别 () 筛选类别的集合。

span.span: Returns an object that represents a collection of all of the visible and filtered categories (a ) in the chart group.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int GapWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 条形图和柱形图：以条形图或柱形宽度的百分比返回或设置条形图或柱形簇之间的空间。

span.span: Bar and Column charts: Returns or sets the space between bar or column clusters as a percentage of the bar or column width.

summary.span: 对于饼图中的扇形和饼图中的条形：返回或设置图表的第一节和第二节之间的间距。

span.span: Pie of Pie and Bar of Pie charts: Returns or sets the space between the primary and secondary sections of the chart.

para.span: 该属性的值必须介于 0 到 500 之间。

span.span: The value of this property must be between 0 and 500.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Has3DShading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果图表组具有三维阴影，则为 True。

span.span: True if the chart group has three-dimensional shading.

summary.span: 此属性仅适用于图面图表，如果试图将图面图设置为非图面图，它将返回运行时错误。

span.span: This property only applies to surface charts and will return a run-time error if you try to set it to a non-surface chart.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasDropLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果折线图或者面积图中有垂直线，则该属性值为 True。

span.span: True if the line chart or area chart has drop lines.

summary.span: 仅应用于折线图和面积图。

span.span: Applies only to line and area charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasHiLoLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果折线图有高低点连线，则该属性值为 True。

span.span: True if the line chart has high-low lines.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasRadarAxisLabels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果雷达图有坐标轴标签，则该属性值为 True。

span.span: True if a radar chart has axis labels.

summary.span: 仅应用于雷达图。

span.span: Applies only to radar charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasSeriesLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果堆积柱形图或堆积条形图有系列线，或者复合饼图或复合条饼图在两个部分之间有连接线，则该属性值为 True。

span.span: True if a stacked column chart or bar chart has series lines or if a Pie of Pie chart or Bar of Pie chart has connector lines between the two sections.

summary.span: 仅适用于堆积柱形图、堆积条形图、复合饼图或复合条饼图。

span.span: Applies only to stacked column charts, bar charts, Pie of Pie charts, or Bar of Pie charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasUpDownBars { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果折线图有涨跌柱线。

span.span: True if a line chart has up and down bars.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HiLoLines As HiLoLines

summary.span: 返回 一个对象，该对象代表图表上系列的高-低线。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the high-low lines for a series on a line chart.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象在其同类对象所组成的集合内的编号。

span.span: Returns the index number of the object within the collection of similar objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Overlap { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 指定条柱的摆放方式。

span.span: Specifies how bars and columns are positioned.

summary.span: 可以是 –100 到 100 之间的值。

span.span: Can be a value between –100 and 100.

summary.span: 只适用于二维条形图和二维柱形图。

span.span: Applies only to 2-D bar and 2-D column charts.

para.span: 如果此属性设置为 –100，将放置条形，以便它们之间的条形宽度为一。

span.span: If this property is set to –100, bars are positioned so that there's one bar width between them.

para.span: 如果重叠比例为 0（零），条形之间没有间距（一个条形紧挨着另一条形）。

span.span: If the overlap is 0 (zero), there's no space between bars (one bar starts immediately after the preceding bar).

para.span: 如果重叠比例为 100，所有条形将完全重叠。

span.span: If the overlap is 100, bars are positioned on top of each other.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns the parent object for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RadarAxisLabels As TickLabels

summary.span: 返回一 个对象，该对象代表指定图表组的雷达图坐标轴标签。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the radar axis labels for the specified chart group.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SecondPlotSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置复合饼图或复合条饼图的第二部分的大小，以主饼图大小的百分比表示。

span.span: Returns or sets the size of the secondary section of either a Pie of Pie chart or a Bar of Pie chart, as a percentage of the size of the primary pie.

summary.span: 可以是 5 到 200 之间的值。

span.span: Can be a value from 5 to 200.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object SeriesCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function SeriesCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

param.name: Index

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 数据系列的名称或编号。

span.span: The name or number of the series.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象代表 (或) 或图表 (集合中) 系列 的集合。

span.span: Returns an object that represents either a single series (a object) or a collection of all the series (a collection) in the chart or chart group.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SeriesLines As SeriesLines

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象代表堆积条形图或堆积柱形图 的系列线。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the series lines for a stacked bar chart or a stacked column chart.

summary.span: 仅适用于堆积条形图和堆积柱形图。

span.span: Applies only to stacked bar and stacked column charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowNegativeBubbles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果在图表组中显示表示负值的气泡，则该属性值为 True。

span.span: True if negative bubbles are shown for the chart group.

summary.span: 仅对气泡图有效。

span.span: Valid only for bubble charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlSizeRepresents SizeRepresents { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlSizeRepresents get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlSizeRepresents value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置气泡图上气泡大小表示的含义。

span.span: Returns or sets what the bubble size represents on a bubble chart.

summary.span: 可为以下 XlSizeRepresents 常量之一：xlSizeIsArea 或 xlSizeIsWidth。

span.span: Can be either of the following XlSizeRepresents constants: xlSizeIsArea or xlSizeIsWidth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlChartSplitType SplitType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlChartSplitType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlChartSplitType value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置复合饼图或复合条饼图的两个部分的拆分方式。

span.span: Returns or sets the way the two sections of either a Pie of Pie chart or a Bar of Pie chart are split.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ SplitValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置分隔复合饼图或复合条饼图的两个部分的阈值。

span.span: Returns or sets the threshold value separating the two sections of either a Pie of Pie chart or a Bar of Pie chart.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SubType { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 保留以供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Type { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 保留以供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpBars As UpBars
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::UpBars ^ UpBars { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::UpBars ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回 一个对象，该对象代表线形图上的上线。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the up bars on a line chart.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VaryByCategories { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果 Microsoft Excel 为每个数据标记分配不同的颜色或图案。

span.span: True if Microsoft Excel assigns a different color or pattern to each data marker.

summary.span: 图表必须只包含一个系列。

span.span: The chart must contain only one series.
